list.expr:
count by (job,instance,alertname) (max_over_time(ALERTS{alertstate="firing", severity="critical", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))
  * on(job,instance) group_left group by (job,instance) (sysUpTime{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"})
list.name: Critical alert

list.expr:
count by (job,instance,alertname) (max_over_time(ALERTS{alertstate="firing", severity="warning", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))
  * on(job,instance) group_left group by (job,instance) (sysUpTime{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"})
list.name: Warning alert

panels.description: The time since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.
panels.title: Uptime

targets.expr:
avg by (job,instance) (
  # NX-OS:
(
  cpmCPUMemoryUsed{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}
  /
  (cpmCPUMemoryUsed{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} + cpmCPUMemoryFree{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}) * 100
)
or
# cisco CISCO-ENHANCED-MEMPOOL-MIB
# cempMemPoolType="10" - virtual memory, i.e in ASA(v).
(
  (
    cempMemPoolUsed{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}
    /
    (cempMemPoolUsed{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} + cempMemPoolFree{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}) * 100
  ) * on (instance, cempMemPoolIndex, entPhysicalIndex) group_left () 
        (cempMemPoolType{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} == 10)/10
)
or
# cisco firmwares that supports only CISCO-MEMORY-POOL-MIB
# ciscoMemoryPoolType="1" - Processor
(ciscoMemoryPoolUsed{ciscoMemoryPoolType="1", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}
/
(ciscoMemoryPoolUsed{ciscoMemoryPoolType="1", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} + ciscoMemoryPoolFree{ciscoMemoryPoolType="1", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}) * 100)

)
or
avg by (job,instance) (
  hrStorageUsed{hrStorageDescr!~".*(?i:(cache|buffer)).*", hrStorageType="1.3.6.1.2.1.25.2.1.2", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}/hrStorageSize{hrStorageDescr!~".*(?i:(cache|buffer)).*", hrStorageType="1.3.6.1.2.1.25.2.1.2", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}*100

)
or
avg by (job,instance) (
  hrStorageUsed{hrStorageDescr="main memory",hrStorageIndex="65536", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}/hrStorageSize{hrStorageDescr="main memory",hrStorageIndex="65536", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}*100

)
or
avg by (job,instance) (
  jnxOperatingBuffer{jnxOperatingContentsIndex="9", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}
)

# ignore when ifLastCHange == 0 as invalid
sum by (job,instance,ifName,ifAlias,ifDescr) (
  (sysUpTime{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} - on(job,instance) group_right () (ifLastChange{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance",ifName=~"$ifName"})!=0)
)/100

targets.refId: Network interface unknown protocol in packets dropped

panels.description: The current value of receive buffer-to-buffer credits for this port.
panels.title: FC buffer-to-buffer credit

panels.description:
-TxWaitCount: The number of times the FC-port waited due to lack of transmit credits.

-FramesDiscard: The number of frames discarded by the FC-port.

-TxWtAvgBBCreditTransitionToZero: increments if the credit available is zero for 100 ms.

-BBCreditTransistionFromZero: increments if the transmit b2b credit is zero.

-BBCreditTransistionToZero: increments if the receive b2b credit is zero.

-InvalidTxWords: The number of invalid transmission words detected by the FC-Port.

-InvalidCrcs: The number of invalid CRCs detected by the FC-Port.

targets.refId: FC wait due to lack of transmit credits.

panels.title: Network FC errors

targets.expr:
(
  avg by (job,instance,jnxOperatingDescr) (
  jnxOperatingTemp{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}
)
)!=0
or
avg by (job,instance,entPhysicalName) (
  # https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3433.html
# entSensorPrecision:
# If an object of this type contains a value in the range 1 to
# 9, it represents the number of decimal places in the
# fractional part of an associated EntitySensorValue fixed-
# point number.
# If an object of this type contains a value in the range -8
# to -1, it represents the number of accurate digits in the
# associated EntitySensorValue fixed-point number.
# entSensorScale
#     SYNTAX INTEGER {
#         yocto(1),   -- 10^-24
#         zepto(2),   -- 10^-21
#         atto(3),    -- 10^-18
#         femto(4),   -- 10^-15
#         pico(5),    -- 10^-12
#         nano(6),    -- 10^-9
#         micro(7),   -- 10^-6
#         milli(8),   -- 10^-3
#         units(9),   -- 10^0
#         kilo(10),   -- 10^3
#         mega(11),   -- 10^6
#         giga(12),   -- 10^9
#         tera(13),   -- 10^12
#         exa(14),    -- 10^15
#         peta(15),   -- 10^18
#         zetta(16),  -- 10^21
#         yotta(17)   -- 10^24
#     }
(
  entSensorValue{entSensorScale="9", entSensorType="8", entPhysicalName!~".+(\\d+/\\d+(/\\d+)?).*", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}
  *10^-entSensorPrecision{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}
  or
  entSensorValue{entSensorScale="8", entSensorType="8", entPhysicalName!~".+(\\d+/\\d+(/\\d+)?).*", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}
  *10^-3
  *10^-entSensorPrecision{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}
  or 
  entSensorValue{entSensorScale="7", entSensorType="8", entPhysicalName!~".+(\\d+/\\d+(/\\d+)?).*", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}
  *10^-6
  *10^-entSensorPrecision{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}
)

)
